test.name: Cenario 02: Editar Cadastro de Empresa

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Gerar Empresa
Create Dictionary
kw.msg: ${empresa_dados} = {'razao_social': 'Rita e Lucas Alimentos ME', 'nome_fantasia': 'Rita e Lucas Alimentos ME', 'email': 'faleconosco@ritaelucasalimentosme.com.br', 'cnpj': '34575708000192', 'telefone': '1137497251', 'no...
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.msg: ${nova_empresa} = {'razao_social': 'Rita e Lucas Alimentos ME', 'nome_fantasia': 'Rita e Lucas Alimentos ME', 'email': 'faleconosco@ritaelucasalimentosme.com.br', 'cnpj': '34575708000192', 'telefone': '1137497251', 'no...
kw.doc: Gera dados de empresa aleatórios através da API 4devs

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath://*[text()='Editar Cadastro']' still visible after 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.
kw.status: Element 'xpath://*[text()='Editar Cadastro']' still visible after 5 seconds.

kw.arg: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Fail
kw.msg: O modal nao fechou. Verifique se ha campos invalidos (ver print erro_modal_nao_fechou.png).
kw.arg: O modal nao fechou. Verifique se ha campos invalidos (ver print erro_modal_nao_fechou.png).
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
